data.comment: The match has started.
Fred Grim is making the team's first substitution at Mandemakers Stadion with Lennerd Daneels replacing Ola John.
In the minute 11, Cody Gakpo is on target to give Eindhoven a 0-1 advantage.
Mario Gotze instrumental with a fine assist.
Goal! Mohammed Ihattaren extends Eindhoven's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 14, Pablo Rosario with an assist there.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 59, Philipp Max is booked for the away team.
Ayman Azhil is replacing Vurnon Anita for the home team.
Fred Grim (Waalwijk) is making a third substitution, with Thierry Lutonda replacing Paul Quasten.
In the minute 63, Cyril Ngonge (Waalwijk) gets a yellow card.
Chukwunonso Madueke is replacing Cody Gakpo for Eindhoven at Mandemakers Stadion.
The away team replace Donyell Malen with Joel Piroe.
In the minute 70, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Eindhoven.
Denzel Dumfries nets and Eindhoven extend their lead to 0-3. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Waalwijk make their fourth substitution with Jurien Gaari replacing Said Bakari.
In the minute 72, Sylla Sow is on a sub for Richard van der Venne for Waalwijk.
Pablo Rosario (Eindhoven) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 1-3 through a strike by Finn Stokkers. .
In the minute 86, That's a fine assist from Ayman Azhil.
Eindhoven make their fourth substitution with Adrian Fein replacing Mario Gotze.
The away team have replaced Ibrahim Sangare with Jorrit Hendrix. This is the third substitution made today by Roger Schmidt.
It's 1-4 as the referee blows for full-time.
Fredrik Oppegard is on a sub for Philipp Max for Eindhoven.
It's now 1-4 in Waalwijk as Chukwunonso Madueke scores for Eindhoven.
